titles: Citt and Bumpkin in a dialogue over a pot of ale concerning matters of religion and government
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
notes: A reply to Charles Blount's Appeal from the country to the city. Cf. Kitchen, G. Sir Roger L'Estrange, p. 255-256.
A second part was published in the same year.
keywords: Blount, Charles, 1654-1693. --  Appeal from the country to the city.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1660-1688 --  Anecdotes.
